Text: Kite and Key Homecoming ReceptionDear Kite and Key Alumni Thank you for taking the time to respond to our letter this past summer The Kite and Key Executive Board is excited to have such an active group of alumni who are interested in establishing a Board of Governors To become acquainted with one another we would like to invite you to a Kite and Key Homecoming Reception that will occur after the PennPrinceton football game on Saturday November rd The gathering will be held in the Sweeten House Locust Walk approximately at Attending the reception will be many current Kite and Key students as well as other Penn Alumni with whom you can speak For those of you who are interested we hope to informally and individually gather your ideas and visions of an Alumni Board of Governors Food and drinks will be served To keep you updated on the most recent Kite and Key news and programs we have attached the Fall Newsletter that was distributed at our first General Meeting in September Inside you will find information about the exciting initiatives that each of our projects hope to achieve in the coming months We hope that you can attend the reception during Homecoming weekend If you believe you will be able to join us please RSVP to and provide us with the number of guests in your party If you cannot attend and would like to offer us input please do so by emailing We look forward to seeing you on November rd Warmly Jeffrey Stewart David Greene Alumni Relations Coordinator President kitekey Fall Newsletterdoc
